comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEDC3A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEDC3A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type DC3A model. This model represents represent older systems, in particular those dc commutator exciters with non-continuously acting regulators that were commonly used before the development of the continuously acting varieties.  These systems respond at basically two different rates, depending upon the magnitude of voltage error. For small errors, adjustment is made periodically with a signal to a motor-operated rheostat. Larger erro

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efd1
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 3.375. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd2
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 3.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: exclim
contents.comment: (exclim).  IEEE standard is ambiguous about lower limit on exciter output. true = a lower limit of zero is applied to integrator output false = a lower limit of zero is not applied to integrator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kv
contents.comment: Fast raise/lower contact setting (K).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seefd1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.267. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seefd2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.068. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: trh
contents.comment: Rheostat travel time (T).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
